players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Sad to see Diana go. Let's share any info we have. I'm a villager, so no special night actions."
You: "I'm also a villager. Bob, why claim villager so early? That seems suspicious to me."
Charlie: "I'm a villager. I've been investigating Alice and I know they're the mafioso. Alice, are you going to deny it or confess?"
You: "Charlie, you're lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He's the mafioso. Why are you trying to protect him?"
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the real detective, why didn't you say so immediately? Alice just claimed detective after being accused. This timing is very suspicious."
